EmailTemplate.name: APP ERRORS
EmailTemplate.subject: eBranch
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting us. Sorry to hear you experienced a problem with your eBranch, I can help resolve this issue. We will also need to know the following information:
Device make and model:
Device software version on the phone:
ICCU App Version:
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
{!Case.OwnerTitle}
Idaho Central Credit Union
Eastern Idaho 208-478-3300
Treasure Valley 208-846-7000
Magic Valley 208-733-4777
www.iccu.com
Helping members achieve financial success.
